1.text: Prepare a microwave-safe dish, preferably glass or Pyrex.

2.text: Lay up to six uncooked bacon strips across the paper towels.
2.vid: /e/e4/Cook Bacon in the Microwave Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Place a layer of paper towels over the top of the bacon strips.
3.vid: /e/e8/Cook Bacon in the Microwave Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.vid: /e/ed/Cook Bacon in the Microwave Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Place a microwave-safe bowl on a microwave-safe plate.
7.vid: /0/0c/Cook Bacon in the Microwave Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Hang slices of bacon over the rim of the bowl.
8.vid: /e/ec/Cook Bacon in the Microwave Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Remove the bacon from the microwave.
